page.title: 18Camping
page.content: My day at camp started at 7 o'clock.I got up,got dressed and went to the farmhouse.Breakfast was ready so I sat down at the table and began to eat. After breakfast I did my job of the day.After the jobs Mr.Mitchell came and told us what to do.We got ourselves ready to go.We walked over the moorlan- ds looking at all different kinds of stone and grasses.We discovered many different things on our walk although it was very,very tiring.After our walk we went back to the campsite and waited for our tea which we were all ready for.After tea I played quiet games with my friends and talked until it was time for bed.We walked upto our tents and climbed into our wanted beds.That was the end of my day.
